SubscriptionTargetForm.description: The details of the subscription target configuration.

Content.description: The content of the subscription target configuration.

FormName.description: The form name included in the subscription target configuration.

description: Subscription targets enables one to access the data to which you have subscribed in your projects.

ApplicableAssetTypes.description: The asset types that can be included in the subscription target.

AuthorizedPrincipals.description: The authorized principals of the subscription target.

CreatedAt.description: The timestamp of when the subscription target was created.

CreatedBy.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the subscription target.

DomainId.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which subscription target is created.

DomainIdentifier.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which subscription target would be created.

EnvironmentId.description: The ID of the environment in which subscription target is created.

EnvironmentIdentifier.description: The ID of the environment in which subscription target would be created.

Id.description: The ID of the subscription target.

ManageAccessRole.description: The manage access role that is used to create the subscription target.

Name.description: The name of the subscription target.

ProjectId.description: The identifier of the project specified in the subscription target.

Provider.description: The provider of the subscription target.

SubscriptionTargetConfig.description: The configuration of the subscription target.

Type.description: The type of the subscription target.

UpdatedAt.description: The timestamp of when the subscription target was updated.

UpdatedBy.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the subscription target.
